MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Forgive me.
To the Okura family, the Sakurakouji family, and everyone who has been so close to me.
It seems that my life ends here--
This was not the time to be thinking about what I should write on my death note.
In the first place, there was no way I could leave a death note under these circumstances.
Even if I could, there would be no guarantee that it would reach anyone.
So before that, I can't just die here--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Risona, get behind me!」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「What is this place? And what is this monster...?
\For real, I think this is a dream.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「I'm sorry, but I don't think this is a dream.」
That's why I can't die. My sister, Risona...
The only person who can protect her from the monster in front of us
is me, right here, right now.
So, how on earth did I get into this situation?
This all started with - The Train Fashion Show.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Hmm, so this is the Train Fashion Show?」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「It is a show held on a train...
Labelled exactly as it says on the tin.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Ahaha, isn't it easy to understand?
As they say, simple is beeest~ sorta.」
The train fashion show was held on a scrapped train.
The decorated train car is used as a runway
and models parade through it in a spectacular show.
Top designers from the industry took part,
and it was so popular that the tickets are sold out very quickly--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Luna-chomu knows the organiser of the show.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Ah. I didn't remember that, but apparently we are acquainted with each other.
I was invited as a VIP.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Lady Luna, I don't know if I would call that acquainted.」
However, since we are students at Filia Girl's Academy, a fashion school,
this is a very good place to study about fashion shows.
For that reason, we have gratefully accepted the invitation to participate.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Hmm, would've been great if Ursule and Mizuho could come too.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「I heard they both have things to do at home. I guess it can't be helped.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Dearest ladies, I heard that there are various items on display in the compartment over there.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Sounds interesting, let's go there.」
ーーーー

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Oh, lookie here, there's beautiful mirrors on display.」
In the centre of the compartment were two mirrors in a glass showcase.
One was a crescent-shaped mirror with decorated with gold,
and the other was a cloud-shaped mirror decorated with silver.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「It's kind of a mysterious-looking mirror.」
The silver mirror seemed to represent mist, not clouds.
The front of the showcase were explanations about the two mirrors.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Uhm, the mirror of the moon says...
'On the night of the full moon, when a maiden makes a wish on the mirror of the moon, it will come true'.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Heh, a mirror that makes wishes come true, that would sure raise a hell lot of eyebrows.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Come to think of it, I think tonight is a full moon...」
Suddenly remembered, I turned my eyes to the train window.
The moon, shining brightly, was clearly visible in the sky.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Oho, so you wanna make a wish in the mirror or something?」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Oh, come on, this is all just superstition obviously.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「I know, but I reckon' I should just go with the flow here.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「A wish, I see...
I want to go isekai and be an unrivalled- nah...」
As if in response to Risona's words, the mirror of the moon emitted a bright light.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「WEEEEEEEAH, wa, wait, I'm just joking about that part!」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Minato Yanagase
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「No no no no, nay nay, o'nay.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Luna Sakurakouji
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Hey, did you hear something?」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「I hear it too. But I don't know what it is...
It's as if it's echoing directly in my head.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Voice in head
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「...I'm sick of fulfilling your human desires.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Voice in head
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「But, you wished to go to an otherworld.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Eh, no, that was a bit of a joke...
or really, what's going on, what's this voice...?」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Voice in head
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「I've been waiting for that wish for a long time.
So, I'll grant your wish to make it happen--」
Immediately after the voice told us this, a dazzling light flooded out from the mirror of the moon.
And the four of us were enveloped by the light--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Wait, no way... Lady Luna, Risona, Minato!?」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「What in the world is happening... ugh, the glare--」
I found myself with Risona in this strange meadow.
We were trying to find Luna and Minato, who were nowhere to be seen,
when suddenly these monsters appeared.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Risona, I'll attract their attention, then you can run away.」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「It's impossible, I'm not leaving you.」
The monster was closing in.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: (It's no use, I have to make up my mind--)
「Conductor, please cover me!」
「Engaging!」

As I grit my teeth and awaited the monster's blow,
I suddenly heard a woman's voice.
Immediately afterwards, a strange light flew towards the monsters.
As if by magic, one of the monsters was obliterated.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「T-that was...」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「...M-magic?」
I looked towards where the light flew. Two women are there.
They were in otherworldly-looking gear, their weapons at the ready,
and immediately closed the gap between them and the monsters.
Behind them was a man who appears to be their commander.
Next to him was a girl assisting him.
The commander instructed the two women what to do.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Affirmative!」

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 「Oui, orders received!」
The two women confronted the monster in spectacular fashion.
